loc2.description: The symbol above the doorway glows. Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass gain 2 Stamina and 2 Sanity. If you fail, discard 2 items of your choice.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: At the south gates of Thran, you are stopped by a red-robed sentry until you can tell three dreams beyond belief. Pass a Luck (-1) check to tour the golden spires of Threan, gaining 2 clue tokens in the process. If you failm stay here next turn.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: Pass a Fight (-2) check to lever back the lid of the stone chest. Inside, you find $8. If you fail, lose 1 Stamina.

loc2.description: The huge book opens noiselessly at your approach. If you choose, you may read it, in which case you must pass a Fight (-1) [2] check to defeat its guardian. If you do, draw 3 Spells and keep 2 of them. If you fail, lose 3 Stamina.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: The cavenrs split. Make a Luck (+1) check and consult the chart below: Successes: 0-1: Move to the Black Cave. 2: Move to The Dreamlands. 3+: You enter a dark temple. Pass a Luck (-1) check to draw a Unique Item.
loc1.name: Abyss

other.description: A monster appears!

loc2.description: Pass a Sneak (-1) check or the creatures capture and ecperiment on you. Lose half of your items, then immediately return to Arkham with no memory of the experiments.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: You are bewildered. Pass a Lore (-1) check or stay here next turn.
loc1.name: Abyss

other.description: The insanity of the place finally hits you. Lose 1 Sanity.

loc2.description: You rest a bit beside a small, glowing pool filled with black, blind fish. Pass a Luck (-1) check to notice an unusual object in the water. Fishing it out, you draw 1 Unique Item and gain $3.
loc2.name: Abyss

loc1.name: The Dreamlands
loc1.description: You wander the frozen wastes. No encounter.

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to discover a cache of ancient papers containing valuable information about the mythos. Gain 1 Clue token for every successyou rolled on you Luck check.

loc2.description: As you read the page, you realize that you have stumbled into a written trap. Pass a Lore (-1) check or you are cursed.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: As you are climbing the cliffs in the underworld, your pocket gets caught and tears open. Pass a Speed (-1) check or lose all of your money.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: A hideous monster appears!

loc2.description: The stone creature pursues you. Pass a Speed (-1) check to escape with the statue, gaining $5 and 2 Clue tokens. If you fail, the creature smashes you off the cliff. You are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: Pass a Lore (+0) check to fight off your desire to sleep. If you fail, you freexe in the night. You are lost in time and space. If you succeed, return to Arkham.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: Luck is with you. You stumble on a cache of supplies. Draw 1 Common Item.

loc2.description: That"s it! That"s the document you need! Quietly, you reach for it, trying not to disturb tits guardian. Make a Sneak (-2) check. If you pass, search the Spell deck and take 1 Spell of your choice. If you fail, lose 2 Stamina.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: A glowing light ahead draws you towards it. Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass, the glow is a way home. Return to Arkham. If you fail, the light is a trap set by one of the creatures that lives here. A monster appears!
loc1.name: Abyss

other.description: Pass a Fight (-1) check to hang on to your prize dispite the wind. Draw 1 Spell.

loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check or the book is a prison. If you fail, roll a die. On a failure, a monster appears from the book. On a success, you are drawn into the book for a time. Stay here next turn.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.name: Yuggoth
loc1.description: A monster appears from the darkness!

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find something to defend yourself with. Take the first Weapon from the Common Item Deck.

loc2.description: You are lost in the darkness. Pass a Luck (-1) check or lose 1Sanity stay here next turn.
loc2.name: Abyss

loc1.description: You dring impure water from the River Kra. Pass a Luck (-1) check or lose 1 Stamina and stay here next turn due to illness.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: You are lost in a labyrnth of high walls. Pass a Lore (-1) check or stay here next turn.

loc2.description: The creature"s grip is like steel! Pass a Fight (-2) check to break free and escape. If you fail, the creature"s grip tightens with a sickening pop. You are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.name: Abyss
loc1.description: The feeble glow and warmth of the candle is enough to resore you a bit. Gain 1 Stamina.

other.description: You"ve completed you task, but now you must escape before the portal closes! Pass a Speed (-2) check to return to Arkham. If you fail, you are lost in time and space. In either event, you automatically close the gate that you entered through.

loc2.description: You"re dizzy from the strange ray. Pass a Will (-2) check or lose 1 item of your choice.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: A thief attempts to rob you. Pass a Sneak (+0) check to notice him. If you fail, lose half of your items (your choice) and half your money (rounded up).
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: The strain is too much for your mind. Lose 1 Sanity.

loc2.name: Celeano
loc2.description: A lurking monster appears!

loc1.description: Exposeure and fear weaken your mind. Pass a Will (-2) check or you must either lose 2 Spells of your choice or lose 2 Sanity.
loc1.name: Yuggoth

other.description: Monsters lurk everywhere. Pass a Sneak (-2) check or stay here next turn.

loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-2) check to find a valuable book. If so, search the Unique Item deck and take the first Tome you find
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: Your mind and body are toughened by your experiences. Pass a Will (+0) [2] check to draw 1 Skill.
loc1.name: Plateau of Leng

other.description: Wedged beneath a fallen stone is a scroll. Draw 1 Spell

loc2.description: An old professor from Earth teaches you a thing or two. Pass a Luck (-1) [2] check to draw 1 Skill
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.name: Plateau of Leng
loc1.description: You wander the frozen wastes. No encounter

other.description: You come across a sleeping horror with a tentacle draped across a small gold idol. Silence is of the essence as you attempt to gently easy the idol out from under the creatures pseudopod. Make a Sneak (-1) check. If you pass, gain $3. If you fail, lose 2 Stamina

loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-2) check to find a book small enough to carry. Search the Unique Item deck and take the first tome you find.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass, then, waving goodbye, the happy villagers bestow a gift uppon you. Draw 1 Common Item
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: You find a quiet spot to rest and recuperate. Gain 1 Stamina

loc2.description: The rickety bridge collapses as you cross it. Pass a Fight (-1) check to hang on, finding a relic on the other side. Draw 1 Unique Item. If you fail, you plummet into darkness. You are lost in time and space
loc2.name: Plateau of Leng

loc1.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to come across a riding zebra and save some traveling time. If you are in the first area of The Dreamlands, move to the second area. If you are in the second area, return to Arkham
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: You come across a slaughtered creature. Pass a Luck (-1) check to claim a monster trophy from the cup (even if it is Endless) and gain 2 Clue tokens

loc2.description: Your peril clears your mind. Pass a Will (+0) check to restore your Sanity to its maximum value.
loc2.name: Plateau of Leng

loc1.description: You may choose to try and infiltrate one of the angled structures. If so, make a Sneak (-1) check. If you pass, draw 2 Unique Items and keep 1 of them. If you fail, you are lost in time and space.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: You are beginning to understand the strange creatures here. gain 1 Clue token.

loc2.description: You find secret lore hidden in the mosaics on the wall. Make a Lore (+2) check and gain Clue tokens equal to your successes
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: The conical entity tries to teach you some magic. Pass a Lore (-2) [2] check to draw 2 Spells.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: You find some valuable items that you can sell back in Arkham. Gain $3

loc2.description: Sometimes, voilence is the answer. Pass a Fight (-1) check to break free of your captors and return to Arkham
loc2.name: City of the Great Race

loc1.description: Tour the perfumed jungles of Kied, you come across an ancient ivory palace. Pass a Luck (-1) check to explore it without getting caught. Draw 1 Spell. If you fail the check, lose 1 item of your choice.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: Carefully, you avoid the gaze of a gigantic eye watching an altar. You may try to pass a Sneak (-1) check to steal a scroll from the dais. Draw 1 Spell. If you fail, you are wracked by pain and lose 3 Sanity.

loc2.description: The hooved, wide-mouthed traders of this land are wealthy, but dangerous. You may make a Lore (-2) check to rade with them. If you pass, gain $6. If you fail, you are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: Plateau of Leng

loc1.description: You must have that device if you are to escape from this accursed city. Pass a Sneak (-1) [2] check to draw 1 Unique Item and return to Arkham. If you fail, your captors are none too kind. Lose 3 Sanity and 1 Stamina
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to discover a vital document. Gain 2 Clue tokens.

loc2.name: Plateau of Leng
loc2.description: Your red-eyed reflection in the mirror captures your attention. Stay here next turn

loc1.description: You find yourself in an ancient and abandoned temple. Pass a Luck (-1) check to find a golden statue worth $10. However, if you take it, you are Cursed
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: The rope seems to extend upwards forever, but it"s the only way out of the crevasse you find yourself in. Pass a Fight (-1) check to climb it and return to Arkham. If you fail, you fall, losing 2 Stamina and staying here next turn

loc2.name: Plateau of Leng
loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-2) check to find some useful things among the bones. If so, draw 1 Common Item and 1 Spell.

loc1.description: Pass a Will (-1) check to convince the Rulers of Rokol to share their wealth with you. If so, roll two dice and add them together. Gain that much money
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find the gate back. If so, immediately return to Arkham

loc2.description: You come across a wizened old creature who debates with you for some time. If you pass a Lore (-1) check, the creature is amused by your discussion and you are Blessed
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to chance across one of the little red singing birds of Celephais. Its song brings solace and strength to your heart. Restore your Sanity and Stamina to their maximum values.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: Pass a Fight (-2) check to pry open a grate you find built into the wall. Inside, you find something fascinating. Draw 1 Unique Item

loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find something useful among the incomprehensible artifacts. If so, draw 1 Unique Item
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: You encounter the talking cats of Ulthar. Pass a Will (+0) check to draw 1 Spell.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: A glimpse of home gives you hope. Gain 1 Sanity.

loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-2) check to find a valuable book. If so, search the Unique Item deck and take the first Tome you find
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: Your mind and body are toughened by your experiences. Pass a Will (+0) [2] check to draw 1 Skill.
loc1.name: Plateau of Leng

other.description: Wedged beneath a fallen stone is a scroll. Draw 1 Spell

loc2.description: While wandering the phosphorescent woods, you are surrounded by hungry zoogs! Make a Luck (-2) check. If you pass, they take a liking to you and give you a gourd of moon-tree wine. Gain 1 Sanity and 1 Clue token. If you fail, the zoogs close in around you, their teeth gleaming. You are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: The shadow tries to force its way between your lips. Pass a Fight (-2) check or lose 2 Stamina and stay here next turn.
loc1.name: r"lyeh

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find a quiet spot to rest. Gain 2 Stamina and 2 Sanity.

loc2.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check or you are faced with an enormous mountain with a strange symbol carved into it, as if by the claw of a gigantic creature. The world swims around you and you lose 3 Sanity.
loc2.name: abyss

loc1.description: Pass a Speed (-1) check or you slip and slide down a barnacled surface, slashing your skin to ribbons. Lose 3 Stamina.
loc1.name: r"lyeh

other.description: The obsidian door refuses to open. Pass a Fight (-1) check or stay here next turn, struggling with it.

loc2.description: In the valley of Pnoth, where the dholes crawl and burrow nastily, you hear a slithering among the mountains of bone. Make a Sneak (-1) check. If you fail, you are devoured. If you pass, gain 3 Clue tokens and return immediately to Arkham.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: The villagers leap around a bonfire on the hoary plain. Pass a Sneak (-1) check or you are captured and subjected to terrible rites. Lose 3 Sanity and 3 Stamina, then stay here next turn.
loc1.name: plateau of leng

other.description: Pass a Speed (-1) check to grab the carving before it falls. Draw 1 Spell.

loc2.description: Pass a Speed (-1) check to avoid a monstrous mass. If you fail, you are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: abyss

loc1.name: r"lyeh
loc1.description: A slimy monster appears!

other.description: The colors are blinding. Pass a Lore (-1) check or stay here next turn.

loc2.description: The ice bridge begins to crack. Pass a Luck (-1) check or fall into the icy depths. If you fall, you are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: The stone arch breaks! Pass a Speed (-1) check to dive out of the way or roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
loc1.name: abyss

other.description: The humidity and heat is exhausting. Lose 1 Stamina.

loc2.description: Avalanche! Pass a Speed (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: While you are climbing a high cliff, you begin to slip. Pass a Speed (-1) check or crash down the mountain, losing 2 Stamina.
loc1.name: plateau of leng

other.description: The shadowy entity gives up the chase. Lose 1 Stamina from exhaustion.

loc2.description: A vast stirring rumbles through the plateau. Pass a Sneak (+0) check or roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
loc2.name: plateau of leng

loc1.description: Slip on wet stones and slide into a pit. Pass a Luck (+0) check to climb out. If you fail, lose 1 Sanity and stay here next turn.
loc1.name: r"lyeh

other.description: There is nothing here but barren wastes. No encounter.

loc2.description: The loathsome villagers send out their strongest warrior to fight you in unarmed combat. Pass a Fight (-1) [2] check to defeat him and draw 1 Unique Item and gain 1 Clue token. Otherwise lose 1 Sanity and 2 Stamina.
loc2.name: plateau of leng

loc1.description: You are disturbed by unsettling echoes. Pass a Sneak (-1) check to quiet them or lose 2 Sanity.
loc1.name: abyss

other.description: You push yourself to the limit. Roll 1 die for each point of Stamina you have. Lose 1 Stamina for each die that does not roll a success. If you do not fall unconscious, gain 1 Clue token for each die that rolled a success.

loc2.description: The wind increases, and you feel your feet go numb. Pass a Fight (-1) check or lose 2 Stamina.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: Hurricane winds smash you against the cyclopean stones. Pass a Fight (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina.
loc1.name: r"lyeh

other.description: A lurking monster appears!

loc2.name: plateau of leng
loc2.description: A monster appears from the shadows!

loc1.description: Starving, you consider eating some of the glowing mushrooms. If you decide to do so, make a Luck (-1) check. If you fail, roll a die and lose that much Stamina. If you succeed, roll a die and gain that much Stamina.
loc1.name: abyss

other.description: The pinkish rays nearly get you. Pass a Sneak (+0) check or lose 2 Stamina.

loc2.description: The shantak claws at you as it swoops past overhead. Pass a Speed (-2) check or lose 2 Stamina as its claws rake your chest.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.name: abyss
loc1.description: A monster appears!

other.description: You sleep, fitfully, and awaken to the sound of your own voice, chanting something. Make a Luck (-2) check. If you pass, you are able to retain what you are saying. Draw 1 Spell and gain 2 Clue tokens. If you fail, the chant attracts something unsavory. A monster appears!

loc2.description: You are taken to a prehistoric monestary, where a high priest in a yellow silken mask questions you. Pass a Lore (-2) check to answer him to his satisfaction. Gain your freedom and 1 Spell. Otherwise, you are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: plateau of leng

loc1.description: You become tangled in the damp seaweed. Pass a Luck (-1) check to pull free before something finds you while you"re helpless. If you fail, roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
loc1.name: r"lyeh

other.description: Pass a Luck (-1) check to discover a useful object in your wanderings. Draw 1 Unique Item.

loc2.description: The meeping of the ghouls in the tunnels echoes in your ears. Pass a Will(-2) check or lose 2 Sanity.
loc2.name: The Dreamlands

loc1.description: You trip over a stone outcropping that shouldn"t be there. Pass a Speed(-1) check or you are lost in time and space.
loc1.name: R"lyeh

other.description: A monster appears from the shadows!

loc2.description: An alien mind forces its way into your body. Pass a Luck(-2) check to guess a way to drive it out, gaining 2 Clue tokens in the process, or else stay here next turn, serving as its host body.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: The odd plant has you in its clutches. Pass a Fight(-1) check to break free. If you fail. lose 1 Stamina and 1 Sanity as it partially digests you.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: A glimmer of gold catches your eye. Gain $2.

loc2.description: The hideous whistling fills your ears. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 2 Sanity.
loc2.name: City of the Great Race

loc1.name: R"lyeh
loc1.description: The night stars change and the brazen temple doors open, pouring forth a vast, black corpulence. Roll a die and lose that much Sanity.

other.description: The sky is spinning. Pass a Will(-2) check or pass out and stay here next turn.

loc2.name: City of the Great Race
loc2.description: In a flash of insight, you realize the purpose of the bladed artifact. Shivering, you put it back where you found it. Lose 1 Sanity but gain 1 Clue token.

loc1.description: The stink of this place is unbearable. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 1 Stamina, 1 Sanity, and your lunch.
loc1.name: R"lyeh

other.description: Time and space bend around you. Make a Luck(-1) check. If you pass, return to Arkham. If you fail, stay here next turn.

loc2.description: The golden city of your dreams is threatening to become an obsession. Pass a Luck(-1) check or stay here next turn to hunt for it.
loc2.name: The Dreamlands

loc1.description: Your only hope is to steal a byakhee and some space mead! Pass a Sneak(-2) check to escape. Return to Arkham and gain 2 Clue tokens. If you fail, you are lost in time and space.
loc1.name: Yuggoth

other.description: You stare into the face of madness. Roll 1 die for each point of Sanity you have. Lose 1 Sanity for each die that does not roll a success. If you do not go insane, gain 1 Clue token for each die that rolled a success.

loc2.name: The Dreamlands
loc2.description: You see the mountains move. Lose 1 Sanity from the terror.

loc1.description: Fear grabs you as the buzzing entities approach. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 2 Sanity.
loc1.name: Yuggoth

other.description: A ripple in the air passes over you. Pass a Lore(-1) check or lose 1 Spell of your choice as it is burned from your mind.

loc2.name: Yuggoth
loc2.description: Breathing hard, you stay huddled against the rock until the sounds of pursuit fade into the distance. No encounter.

loc1.description: You run for the boat. Pass a Speed(-1)[2] check to reach it in time. If you do, you escape with vital information. Gain 5 Clue tokens. If you fail, stay here next turn, hiding from your pursuer.
loc1.name: R"lyeh

other.description: Your mind is flooded with knowledge. Make a lore(-2) check. If you pass it, draw 1 Spell, but lose 1 Sanity.

loc2.description: The cylindered head mocks your hopes. "You"ll never return home!" it cackles. Pass a Will(-2) check or lose 2 Sanity.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: The buzzing language of your captors begins to make sense to you. Gain 2 Clue tokens. then you must pass a Luck(-1) check to avoid hearing about the origins of the mankind and thereby losing 2 Sanity.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: A monster appears!

loc2.description: Pass a Luck(+0) check or stumble into a spider"s web. Lose 2 Sanity and stay here next turn while struggling to get free.
loc2.name: The Dreamlands

loc1.description: A horrible visage captures your gaze. Pass a Will(+0) check to look away or lose 1 Stamina and stay here next turn.
loc1.name: R"lyeh

other.description: Suddenly, the things you"ve seen make sense! Gain 1 Clue token.

loc2.description: You come across an abandoned onyx quarry whose chiselled vacancies are so vast that it staggers your mind. Pass a Lore(-1) check to avoid awakening anything here, or else lose 3 Sanity.
loc2.name: The Dreamlands

loc1.name: City of the Great Race
loc1.description: you wander the empty streets of the city. No encounter.

other.description: The unending blackness terrifies you. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 1 Sanity and 1 Stamina from fear and exhaustion.

loc2.description: A strange creature stare at you with burning eyes. it is as if its gaze were stealing your soul. Pass a Luck(-1) check or roll a die and subtract 2 from it (minimum 9), then lose that much Stamina and Sanity.
loc2.name: Yuggoth

loc1.description: The city is filled with unnerving alien angles. Pass a Speed(-1) check to avoid touching them or lose 1 Sanity.
loc1.name: R"lyeh

other.description: You are not safe here. a monster appears!

loc2.description: The stone face reveals to you one of the deepest secrets of the Dreamlands. Pass a Lore(-1)[2] check to gain 4 Clue tokens. If you fail the check, however the sight claims your last shred of sanity. Lose all your Sanity.
loc2.name: The Dreamlands

loc1.description: Glancing behind you, you see that the beasts are still chasing you. Pass a Speed(-1) check or be lost in time and space.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: Suddenly you notice something that you had previously missed. Gain 1 Clue token.
